page.title: 15HILLSBOROUGH PARK
page.content: Hillsborough Park opens at 8.00am & closes at 9.00pm. There are lots of things to do. There are tennis courts and fields for games and picnics when it's fine. Younger children use the playground which has swings, slides, roundabouts and climbing frames. We feed the ducks & go fishing in the pond. You can't go fishing there over 16. There is a bowling green where pensioners go to pass the time. Near the library is an arena with a running track where some schools hold their sports days. There is a large carpark. In the summer they hold the Sheffield Show here. The Sheffield Marathon starts and finishes here too. Later in the year there are fairs. Hillsborough Park is a very pleasant place to be on a summers day.
